job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
     * Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
     * Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.
job_details.full_text:
Data software engineer

* Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
     * Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
     * Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering tasks related to Kafka streaming and real-time data processing. While it involves software development and maintenance, it lacks specific mentions of AI/ML models, generative techniques, or advanced AI-specific frameworks, which are central to the GenAI Engineer and ML Engineer profiles. The role appears to be more aligned with traditional data engineering and backend development rather than AI/ML specialization.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate' directly relates to building and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure for real-time data flow.
job_tasks.phrase: Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing' describes the creation and enhancement of software components within a larger system, which is a core aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency' refers to the operational aspects of keeping software systems running smoothly in production, which aligns with operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency
